name: In Celebration of Violence
description: A fantasy action roguelike of exploration and murder. Live, kill, die, improve, live again.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: Athlon II X3 @ 3.20GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 5570 Storage: 350 MB available space Sound Card: Nay! Additional Notes: It requires more than you'd think. I suck at optimization.
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 350 MB available space Sound Card: The most expensive one.
